alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 21 at 6:07PM EDT until May 21 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 255 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KENTUCKY THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST KENTUCKY LEWIS IN NORTHERN KENTUCKY MASON ROBERTSON IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 21 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO DELAWARE FAIRFIELD FAYETTE OH FRANKLIN OH HOCKING LICKING MADISON PICKAWAY UNION OH IN SOUTH CENTRAL OHIO ADAMS HIGHLAND PIKE ROSS SCIOTO IN SOUTHWEST OHIO BROWN CLINTON IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO CHAMPAIGN CLARK GREENE HARDIN LOGAN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADA, BEAVERCREEK, BELLEFONTAINE, BLANCHESTER, CHILLICOTHE, CIRCLEVILLE, COLUMBUS, DELAWARE, FAIRBORN, GEORGETOWN, GREENFIELD, HILLSBORO, KENTON, LANCASTER, LOGAN, LONDON, MARYSVILLE, MAYSVILLE, MOUNT OLIVET, MOUNT ORAB, NEWARK, PEEBLES, PICKERINGTON, PIKE LAKE, PIKETON, PLAIN CITY, PORTSMOUTH, SPRINGFIELD, TOLLESBORO, URBANA, VANCEBURG, WASHINGTON COURT HOUSE, WAVERLY, WEST JEFFERSON, WEST UNION, WHEELERSBURG, WILMINGTON, AND XENIA.
